name: Tile Trial!
description:
Tile Trial! is a chill color-matching puzzle game for 1-2 players. Solve each randomly generated puzzle by placing all of the tiles on the gameboard such that every edge matches. They need to match on opposite sides of the gameboard too!

Generate customized puzzles! For a greater challenge, increase the size of the board or add rotations. For a more traditional jigsaw puzzle experience, add edges.

To play with a friend, host a team puzzle and have your friend connect directly by entering your IP address.

Features:

  • Customize your puzzle experience!
  • 1 Player Timed Puzzles
  • 2 Player Co-op (Direct Connection)
